definition: to open and close (the mouth etc)/friendly/compliant/Taiwan pr. [xi4]
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
to open and close (the mouth etc)

sentences.english: He stood up and drew the curtains to let in the pale glint of dawn.
sentences.chinese: 他起身拉開窗簾，讓黎明的翕光射進房間。

sentences.english: Memories of his first love were still enshrined in his heart.
sentences.chinese: 他依然將初戀的回憶珍藏在心的神翕裏。

sentences.english: Love eis a fabric that nature wove and fantasy embroidered.
sentences.chinese: 愛情是一方織巾，用翕自然編織，用幻想點綴。

sentences.english: Let me note down your address and telephone number.
sentences.chinese: 讓我記下你的地址和翕電話號碼。

definition: to choke with emotion/to choke on a piece of food
to hold back/to restrain/to control (oneself)/to collect/Taiwan pr. [lian4]
the corners of the mouth/the lips
number 20 of the 28 constellations 二十八宿, approx. Orion 獵戶座|猎户座
variant of 嘴, mouth/beak/spout (of teapot etc)
